customTemplate.title: Custom Template
customTemplate.description: Write a Leaf template to render your selected apps. Use #for(app in apps): to iterate.

upload.title: Upload App Information
upload.subtitle: Upload ZIP files containing appfilter.xml and icon PNGs to add app information to the database.
upload.selectFilesDesc: Upload ZIP files containing appfilter.xml files and PNG icons. Multiple files can be uploaded at once.
upload.dropZone: Drop files here or click to browse
upload.previewDesc: Review the parsed app entries before submitting.
upload.iconPackSelectionDesc: Optionally associate these app entries with one of your icon packs. If not selected, the entries will be added to the database without an icon pack association.
upload.selectedFilesAssociation: Selected files and icon pack association
upload.dragDropHint: Drag and drop ZIP files here
upload.noEntriesParsed: No app entries parsed yet. Upload ZIP files containing appfilter.xml.
upload.uploadIconsDesc: Include app icons in the upload. Disable this if you only need to submit app metadata.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.overviewDesc: View your icon pack statistics and activity.
dashboard.recentActivityDesc: Your recent icon pack requests and updates.
dashboard.activityNotReady: Activity data will be available when the API is ready.

iconPack.versionsDesc: Manage versions and access tokens for this icon pack.
iconPack.noVersions: No versions yet. Create one to get started.
iconPack.autocomplete.title: Autocomplete Missing Apps
iconPack.autocomplete.description: Found apps with matching package names that are not yet adapted. Set drawable names to mark them as adapted.
iconPack.autocomplete.noResults: No missing apps found. All apps with matching package names are already adapted!
iconPack.autocomplete.error.fetch: Failed to fetch missing apps. Please try again.
iconPack.autocomplete.error.noSelection: Please set drawable names for at least one app before submitting.
iconPack.autocomplete.error.submit: Failed to mark apps as adapted. Please try again.
iconPack.importDialogDesc: Upload an appfilter.xml file to batch import adapted apps.
iconPack.importSelectFileDesc: Drag and drop or click to browse
iconPack.importNoEntries: No valid entries found in XML file
iconPack.importDuplicateError: Found {{count}} app with conflicting drawable names. Please fix your appfilter.xml and try again.
iconPack.importDuplicateError_other: Found {{count}} apps with conflicting drawable names. Please fix your appfilter.xml and try again.
iconPack.importInvalidDrawableError: Found {{count}} app with invalid drawable name. Please fix your appfilter.xml and try again.
iconPack.importInvalidDrawableError_other: Found {{count}} apps with invalid drawable names. Please fix your appfilter.xml and try again.
iconPack.previewDialogDesc: Review all parsed apps before importing. Only valid apps will be imported.
iconPack.previewHasErrors: Some apps have errors and will not be imported
iconPack.previewStatusDuplicate: Multiple conflicting drawable names in XML
iconPack.previewStatusAlreadyAdapted: Already adapted to this icon pack
iconPack.collaboratorsDescOwner: Share this icon pack with other designers
iconPack.collaboratorsDescCollaborator: You are a collaborator on this icon pack
iconPack.onlyOwnerCanDelete: Only the owner can delete this icon pack
iconPack.cannotAddYourself: You cannot add yourself as a collaborator
iconPack.alreadyCollaborator: This designer is already a collaborator
iconPack.onlyOwnerCanManage: Only the owner can manage collaborators
iconPack.designerSearchNotImplemented: Designer search API not yet implemented. Please contact backend team to add GET /designer/search endpoint.
iconPack.dangerZoneDescOwner: Permanently delete this icon pack and all its data
iconPack.dangerZoneDescCollaborator: You cannot delete this icon pack as you are not the owner
iconPack.deletePackConfirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the icon pack "{{name}}" and all its versions.
iconPack.deleteVersionConfirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete version "{{version}}".
iconPack.categoriesPlaceholder: Type and press Enter to add
iconPack.categoryTooLong: Category must be 50 characters or less
iconPack.exportDialogDesc: Configure export options and select which apps to mark as new.
iconPack.exportSliderDesc: Apps adapted after this date will be marked as "New" in drawable.xml
iconPack.exportNoNewApps: No apps will be marked as new

createIconPack.title: Create Icon Pack
createIconPack.description: Enter a name for your new icon pack.

createVersion.title: Create Version
createVersion.description: Enter a version string for the new version.

createToken.title: Create Access Token
createToken.description: Create an access token for version "{{version}}". This token can be used to submit app requests.
createToken.copyWarning: This token will only be shown once. Copy it now.
createToken.storeSecurely: Store this token securely. You can create a new token at any time.

addTag.title: Add Tag
addTag.description: Select an existing tag to add to this app.
addTag.noAvailableTags: All available tags have been added to this app.

drawableName.title: Enter Drawable Name
drawableName.inputPlaceholder: Type or select a drawable name...
drawableName.errorInvalidFormat: Must start with a letter and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores

manageCollaborators.title: Manage Collaborators
manageCollaborators.description: Add or remove collaborators for this icon pack
manageCollaborators.searchHint: Search for designers by their email address

markAsAdapted.title: Mark as Adapted
markAsAdapted.description: Select an icon pack to mark this app as adapted.
markAsAdapted.noIconPacks: No icon packs found. Create one in the dashboard first.

errors.drawableNameMustStartWithLetter: Must start with a lowercase letter
errors.drawableNameInvalidChars: Can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores
